name: Find the Best Food Deals Automatically with Bright Data & n8n

user.name: Yaron Been

description:
# 

## Description

This workflow automatically scans food delivery platforms and restaurant websites to find the best deals and discounts. It helps you save money on meals by aggregating special offers and promotions in one place.

## Overview

This workflow automates finding the best food deals and discounts from various websites. It uses Bright Data to scrape deal information and can be configured to send you notifications or save the deals to a spreadsheet.

### Tools Used

*   **n8n:** The automation platform that orchestrates the workflow.
*   **Bright Data:** For scraping food deal websites without getting blocked.
*   **(Optional) Google Sheets/Discord/Telegram:** To store or get notified about the deals.

## How to Install

1.  **Import the Workflow:** Download the `.json` file and import it into your n8n instance.
2.  **Configure Bright Data:** Add your Bright Data credentials to the Bright Data node.
3.  **Set Up Notifications (Optional):** Configure the nodes for Google Sheets, Discord, or Telegram if you want to receive notifications.
4.  **Customize:** Specify the websites you want to scrape for deals.

## Use Cases

*   **Foodies:** Always be the first to know about the best restaurant deals in your city.
*   **Students:** Save money by finding cheap eats and special offers.
*   **Families:** Plan your meals around the best grocery and restaurant discounts.

---

## Connect with Me

*   **Website:** [https://www.nofluff.online](https://www.nofluff.online)
*   **YouTube:** [https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos](https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos)
*   **LinkedIn:** [https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/)
*   **Get Bright Data:** [https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25](https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25) (Using this link supports my free workflows with a small commission)

parameters.content:
=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# üöÄ **Pizza Deal Finder Automation ‚Äì Breakdown** This workflow automatically **scrapes Uber Eats for pizza deals**, **extracts the names and discounts**, and **emails the best offers** to you ‚Äî all without writing any complex code! --- ## üü¢ **SECTION 1: üîÅ Trigger & üåç Fetch Pizza Deals Page** ### üîπ Nodes Included: 1. ‚ö° **Trigger Workflow** 2. üåê **Fetch Uber Eats Search Page (Bright Data)** --- ### üîß What Happens Here: * **‚ö° Trigger Workflow**: This node is the starting point. You can configure it to run: * On-demand (when you click "Execute") * On a schedule (e.g., every morning or every 4 hours) * **üåê Fetch Uber Eats Search Page**: * Sends a `POST` request to **Bright Data‚Äôs Web Unlocker API** to access UberEats. * It bypasses JavaScript-heavy pages and bot protections. * URL targeted: something like `https://www.ubereats.com/search?query=pizza` * Returns full HTML of the results page with all pizza restaurant names and their deals. ### üë®‚Äçüíª For Beginners: * This is the **scraping engine** of your workflow. * Bright Data does the heavy lifting (proxying, unblocking, rendering). * You only need to provide your **Bright Data API key** and the target URL. --- ## üü° **SECTION 2: üßπ Extract Pizza Names & Deals** ### üîπ Node Included: * üß© **Extract Names & Deals** --- ### üîß What Happens Here: * This is the **HTML Extract** node. * It scans the raw HTML from the previous step and pulls: * üè∑Ô∏è Restaurant names (e.g., ‚ÄúDomino‚Äôs‚Äù) * üí∏ Deals or special offers (e.g., ‚ÄúFree Item on \$9 Spend‚Äù) ### üõ†Ô∏è CSS Selectors Used: * **Name Selector**: `div.be.f3.bg.f2.ck.bp.bn.k2` ‚Üí extracts all names * **Deal Selector**: `div.hr.bn.k2` ‚Üí extracts all visible deals ‚öôÔ∏è You configure it to **get all matches**, not just one. This ensures multiple restaurants are included. ### üë®‚Äçüíª For Beginners: * This is where **the magic happens** ‚Äî HTML becomes readable data. * No coding is required ‚Äî just CSS selectors you can get from ‚ÄúInspect Element‚Äù in Chrome. * You can reuse this for other platforms like DoorDash or Grubhub by updating the selectors. --- ## üî¥ **SECTION 3: üìß Send Best Deals via Gmail** ### üîπ Node Included: * ‚úâÔ∏è **Send Pizza Deals via Gmail** --- ### üîß What Happens Here: * Sends you an email (or to any recipient you define). * The email includes: * üßæ List of pizza restaurants * üéÅ Associated deals üì¨ You can customize the subject and message format using simple templates: ```html

üçï Today‚Äôs Top Pizza Deals

    {{#each items}}
  • {{this.title}} ‚Äî {{this.deal}}
    • {{/each}}
``` ### üë®‚Äçüíª For Beginners: * This turns your data into a **daily email alert**. * You can plug in **Gmail, Outlook, Telegram, Slack**, etc. * Use this to stay updated or forward to your group of friends or a Discord bot. --- ## ‚ú® Final Thoughts | ‚úÖ Feature | üí° Benefit | | ---------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | | Fully visual | No coding knowledge needed | | Web Unlocker via Bright Data | Access any site without getting blocked | | HTML Extraction | Pull exactly what you need | | Email Integration | Automatically get results | This is a **production-grade workflow** that‚Äôs easy to understand, scalable, and customizable for other food types, locations, or platforms. ---

nodes.name: Fetch Uber Eats Search Page (Bright Data)

values.cssSelector: Domino's

parameters.subject: =Best Pizza Deals Near You Today!

parameters.content:
## üü¢ **SECTION 1: üîÅ Trigger & üåç Fetch Pizza Deals Page**

### üîπ Nodes Included:

1. ‚ö° **Trigger Workflow**
2. üåê **Fetch Uber Eats Search Page (Bright Data)**

---

### üîß What Happens Here:

* **‚ö° Trigger Workflow**: This node is the starting point. You can configure it to run:

  * On-demand (when you click "Execute")
  * On a schedule (e.g., every morning or every 4 hours)

* **üåê Fetch Uber Eats Search Page**:

  * Sends a `POST` request to **Bright Data‚Äôs Web Unlocker API** to access UberEats.
  * It bypasses JavaScript-heavy pages and bot protections.
  * URL targeted: something like `https://www.ubereats.com/search?query=pizza`
  * Returns full HTML of the results page with all pizza restaurant names and their deals.

### üë®‚Äçüíª For Beginners:

* This is the **scraping engine** of your workflow.
* Bright Data does the heavy lifting (proxying, unblocking, rendering).
* You only need to provide your **Bright Data API key** and the target URL.

---

## üü° **SECTION 2: üßπ Extract Pizza Names & Deals**

### üîπ Node Included:

* üß© **Extract Names & Deals**

---

### üîß What Happens Here:

* This is the **HTML Extract** node.
* It scans the raw HTML from the previous step and pulls:

  * üè∑Ô∏è Restaurant names (e.g., ‚ÄúDomino‚Äôs‚Äù)
  * üí∏ Deals or special offers (e.g., ‚ÄúFree Item on \$9 Spend‚Äù)

### üõ†Ô∏è CSS Selectors Used:

* **Name Selector**: `div.be.f3.bg.f2.ck.bp.bn.k2` ‚Üí extracts all names
* **Deal Selector**: `div.hr.bn.k2` ‚Üí extracts all visible deals

‚öôÔ∏è You configure it to **get all matches**, not just one. This ensures multiple restaurants are included.

### üë®‚Äçüíª For Beginners:

* This is where **the magic happens** ‚Äî HTML becomes readable data.
* No coding is required ‚Äî just CSS selectors you can get from ‚ÄúInspect Element‚Äù in Chrome.
* You can reuse this for other platforms like DoorDash or Grubhub by updating the selectors.

---

## üî¥ **SECTION 3: üìß Send Best Deals via Gmail** ### üîπ Node Included: * ‚úâÔ∏è **Send Pizza Deals via Gmail** --- ### üîß What Happens Here: * Sends you an email (or to any recipient you define). * The email includes: * üßæ List of pizza restaurants * üéÅ Associated deals üì¨ You can customize the subject and message format using simple templates: ```html

üçï Today‚Äôs Top Pizza Deals

    {{#each items}}
  • {{this.title}} ‚Äî {{this.deal}}
    • {{/each}}
```

## I‚Äôll receive a tiny commission if you join Bright Data through this link‚Äîthanks for fueling more free content!

### https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25
